entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:38 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming west 30 this morning. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 51 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
